firstquestion.title: What is the base feedstock for the chemical, material or product you are making?
firstquestion.description: Goal: To use base feedstock that preserves natural capital (maximizes resource efficiency) while providing performance and other sustainability benefits.

secondquestion.title: Select the following attributes that describe the base feedstock:

thirdquestion.title: Can the feedstock be depleted (i.e., it is not renewable)?

fourthquestion.title: Are there any known social and environmental issues associated with the raw material feedstock you are using?
enum: Conflict minerals (resources extracted in a conflict zone, the sale of which helps to perpetuate the conflict)
Habitat destruction (e.g. palm oil is associated with deforestation)
